definition: any person in the armed services who holds a position of authority or command, direct or command as an officer
details:
noun
- any person in the armed services who holds a position of authority or command
= example: any person in the armed services who holds a position of authority or command
= synonyms: military officer
- someone who is appointed or elected to an office and who holds a position of trust
= example: someone who is appointed or elected to an office and who holds a position of trust
= synonyms: officeholder
- a person authorized to serve in a position of authority on a vessel
= example: a person authorized to serve in a position of authority on a vessel
= synonyms: ship's officer
- a member of a police force
= example: a member of a police force
= synonyms: policeman, police officer
verb
- direct or command as an officer
